languages.text: На подошве старательно выгравировано: "Поступь его была громоподобна, имя же его, Мерагон, внушало трепет каждому и для супостатов означало одно — "смерть".

traits.locale_text: На подошве старательно выгравировано: "Поступь его была громоподобна, имя же его, Мерагон, внушало трепет каждому и для супостатов означало одно — "смерть".

languages.text: Carefully engraved on the sole are the words, "His footsteps were thunderous, and his name, Meragon, made every soul tremble; it meant but one thing for his foes, and that thing was death."
languages.original_text: На подошве старательно выгравировано: "Поступь его была громоподобна, имя же его, Мерагон, внушало трепет каждому и для супостатов означало одно — "смерть".

languages.text: In die Sohle sind sorgfältig folgende Worte eingraviert: "Seine Schritte waren wie Donner, und sein Name, Meragon, ließ alle Seelen erzittern. Beides bedeutete für seine Feinde nur eines, und das war der Tod."
languages.original_text: Carefully engraved on the sole are the words, "His footsteps were thunderous, and his name, Meragon, made every soul tremble; it meant but one thing for his foes, and that thing was death."

traits.locale_text: In die Sohle sind sorgfältig folgende Worte eingraviert: "Seine Schritte waren wie Donner, und sein Name, Meragon, ließ alle Seelen erzittern. Beides bedeutete für seine Feinde nur eines, und das war der Tod."

languages.text: Les mots suivants sont soigneusement gravés sur la semelle : « Ses pas résonnaient comme le tonnerre et son nom, Meragon, faisait trembler toutes les âmes. Pour ses ennemis, il ne signifiait qu'une seule chose : la mort. »
languages.original_text: Carefully engraved on the sole are the words, "His footsteps were thunderous, and his name, Meragon, made every soul tremble; it meant but one thing for his foes, and that thing was death."

traits.locale_text: Les mots suivants sont soigneusement gravés sur la semelle : « Ses pas résonnaient comme le tonnerre et son nom, Meragon, faisait trembler toutes les âmes. Pour ses ennemis, il ne signifiait qu'une seule chose : la mort. »

languages.text: 这双靴子的靴底上刻着工整的字迹：“他的脚步宛如雷鸣；他的名字，梅拉贡，让每个灵魂颤抖不已。对他的敌人而言，他的存在只意味着一件事情，那就是死亡。”
languages.original_text: Carefully engraved on the sole are the words, "His footsteps were thunderous, and his name, Meragon, made every soul tremble; it meant but one thing for his foes, and that thing was death."

traits.locale_text: 这双靴子的靴底上刻着工整的字迹：“他的脚步宛如雷鸣；他的名字，梅拉贡，让每个灵魂颤抖不已。对他的敌人而言，他的存在只意味着一件事情，那就是死亡。”

languages.text: En la suela se encuentran grabadas cuidadosamente las palabras «Sus pasos eran atronadores, y su nombre, Meragon, hacía temblar a toda alma. Solo significaba una cosa para el enemigo: la muerte».
languages.original_text: Carefully engraved on the sole are the words, "His footsteps were thunderous, and his name, Meragon, made every soul tremble; it meant but one thing for his foes, and that thing was death."

traits.locale_text: En la suela se encuentran grabadas cuidadosamente las palabras «Sus pasos eran atronadores, y su nombre, Meragon, hacía temblar a toda alma. Solo significaba una cosa para el enemigo: la muerte».

languages.text: 靴の裏には以下の言葉が丁寧に刻まれている。「彼の足音は雷鳴のようだ。名前はメラゴン。すべての魂を震え上がらせる。敵にとってそれが意味するものはただ一つ、死である」
languages.original_text: Carefully engraved on the sole are the words, "His footsteps were thunderous, and his name, Meragon, made every soul tremble; it meant but one thing for his foes, and that thing was death."

traits.locale_text: 靴の裏には以下の言葉が丁寧に刻まれている。「彼の足音は雷鳴のようだ。名前はメラゴン。すべての魂を震え上がらせる。敵にとってそれが意味するものはただ一つ、死である」

languages.text: Tabanına özenle kazınmış yazı: "Adımları gök gürültüsü misali inlerdi. Meragon adı; her ruhu ürpertir, hasımlarına yalnız tek mukadderat ilan ederdi: Ölüm."
languages.original_text: Carefully engraved on the sole are the words, "His footsteps were thunderous, and his name, Meragon, made every soul tremble; it meant but one thing for his foes, and that thing was death."

traits.locale_text: Tabanına özenle kazınmış yazı: "Adımları gök gürültüsü misali inlerdi. Meragon adı; her ruhu ürpertir, hasımlarına yalnız tek mukadderat ilan ederdi: Ölüm."
